home.title: Welcome to our shop!
home.description: Here you'll find handmade candles, greeting cards, gypsum figures, and 3D printed products.
home.warning: The website is currently being updated. Very soon, you'll be able to explore the full range of products and place orders online. In the meantime, feel free to get in touch using the contact details at the bottom of the page:

candles.title: Candles
candles.description: I use only high-quality wax (no paraffin) to make candles. Each candle suits different occasions — from shaped candles to themed ones like animals, angels, Halloween, and more.

cards.title: Greeting Cards
cards.description: The greeting cards are handmade — each one is unique and crafted with love. You can order cards for any occasion, including weddings, birthdays, and more.

gips.title: Plaster Figures
gips.description: These plaster figures are lovely handmade decorations for your home. Each piece is a unique gift or accent for any celebration.

print.title: 3D Printing
print.description: I offer 3D-printed souvenirs and decorative items — both custom-made and ready-made models from my catalog.
